articles.title: ‘A line has been drawn’: Olga Smirnova quits Bolshoi Ballet over Ukraine war - The Guardian
articles.description: The first Russian to leave the company over her country’s invasion of its neighbour will join the Dutch National Ballet
articles.content:
The prima ballerina Olga Smirnova, one of Russias biggest dance stars, has quit the Bolshoi Ballet company in Moscow after denouncing the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: Is It Cake? The bizarre baking show that might rescue 2022 - The Guardian
articles.description: Bakers compete to fool judges into thinking cakes are everyday objects – before they take to them with a samurai sword. This Netflix show might be the most pure, brainless fun ever created
